```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,

```

```{r setup}
library(opendap.catalog)
library(terra)
library(dplyr)
library(future)
plan(sequential)
```


```{r}
huss = dplyr::filter(params, id == 'maca_month', variable == 'huss')


cropped = dap_crop(catolog = huss,
                    AOI = AOI::aoi_get(state = "IA"),
                    startDate = "2010-01-01",
                    endDate = "2010-12-31",
                   verbose = FALSE)

glimpse(cropped)
```

```{r, eval=T}
system.time({
 sequential = dap_get(dap = cropped[1,])
})
```

```{r, eval=T}
library(future)
plan(multisession, workers = 7)

system.time({
  ms = dap_get(cropped)
})
```
